events.comment: Prevent the timer from running at the first revelation of a card
loop through every placeholder and replace it with a random card
Fade in and remove the black sprite afterwards
When a hidden card is clicked

Uncover the card:
1) Scale it to "0" on the x axis via tween animation (uncover_1)
2) Change the animation to show the image
3) Scale it to its original size of "1" via tween animation (uncover_0) - see below
The second card has been revealed, remember its id
Wait a moment and turn cards again
The first card has been revealed, remember its id
Remove the pair (doesn't matter if first or second is compared)
Tween the size of the card to "0" and remove the card object afterwards

Cover the cards again:
1) Scale it to "0" on the x axis via tween animation (cover_1)
2) Change the animation to show the back side
3) Scale it to its original size of "1" via tween animation (cover_0) - see below
Update the GUI to show earned pairs
When the mouse hovers over the button, brighten it
When the mouse leaves the button, darken it again
